text: Talk to Me is a 2022 Australian horror movie. It was directed by Danny and Michael Philippou. The movie is about a group of teenagers who find out they can contact spirits using a mysterious severed hand. The movie premiered at the Adelaide Film Festival on October 30, 2022. It was released in Australia on July 27, 2023. Critics liked the story, direction, scary scenes, special effects, and performances, especially by Wilde and Joe Bird. The movie was a big hit, earning about $92.2 million.https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt10638522/ worldwide on a $4.5 million budget, making it A24's highest-grossing horror film.https://www.theguardian.com/culture/2023/aug/04/talk-to-me-us-box-office- highest-grossing-australian-movie-rackaracka A sequel is being worked on. == References == Category:2022 horror movies Category:2020s English-language movies
title: Talk to Me
